name: Coffee Looper
description:
Customers are lining up, time to open the doors and get your barista hat on.

Who doesn’t love a good cup of joe, boba or a nice pastry in the morning? As the owner of the new hip place in town your job is to serve delicious drinks and treats to passers by on their commute to work and earn some cash at the same time.

With the money you earn you’ll be able to expand your business to offer a range of treats including bubble tea and unlock new ingredients to make your coffee have the wow factor like sprinkles, cream and syrups.

Well what are you waiting for? Are you ready to build your coffee empire?

Coffee Looper Features:
- New recipes to unlock
- Serve tasty treats
- Grab the morning rush
